news.title: Infrastructure Press Release - Nuthatch Analysis & Cleanup completed

body.p: The Gentoo Infrastructure team has completed it's analysis of the recent exploitation attempts as well as the majority of the cleanup. The forensic analysis has revealed that while attempts were made, none were successful in compromising the machine nor in disclosing private information.

archives.gentoo.org is back online and packages.gentoo.org will return soon (a status page is currently in place.) The Infrastructure team is reviewing several recommendations in an effort to eliminate similar issues in the future.
The full analysis is available at http://www.gentoo.org/proj/en/infrastructure/nuthatch-writeup/.
